text: Kostyukhina after winning bronze in 2010 Irina Kostyukhina (born 20 October 1981) is a Russian coxswain. She won a bronze medal with the mixed coxed four at the 2010 World Rowing Championships in the adaptive rowing category. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Russian female rowers Category:Coxswains (rowing) Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Russia
title: Irina Kostyukhina
